verses.text_plain: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
verses.verse_html:
7I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war. ▼
▼ for peace: or, a man of peace

tokens.definition: דָבַר dâbar, daw-bar'; a primitive root; perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue:—answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, × well, × work.
